price: 5. Mais ils ont traité de mensonge la vérité lorsqu’elle leur est parvenue, or les voilà donc face à une affaire embarrassante.
arabic: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bal kadhabū bil-ḥaqi lammā jāahum fahum fī amrin marījin
